name: Halloween Night - Tricks, Monsters and Cats in Trouble
name_original: Halloween Night - Tricks, Monsters and Cats in Trouble
description:
Halloween Night - Tricks, Monsters and Cats in Trouble is a game to test your skills to get high score while tapping monsters, tapping cats or letting monsters run away will make you lose potions, losing all potions it is game over.

Souce code: https://github.com/d-apps/flame_jam_1/
